Package com.ppstudios.footballmanager.api.contracts.team

Interface ITeam

All Superinterfaces:
IExporter
public interface ITeam extends IExporter
Interface for managing a team of players.

    • getFormation

      IFormation getFormation()
      Gets the current formation.
      Returns:
      The formation
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the formation is not set

    • getPlayers

      IPlayer[] getPlayers()
      Gets a copy of all players in the team.
      Returns:
      A copy of List of players

    • addPlayer

      void addPlayer(IPlayer player)
      Add a player to the team.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if player is null
      IllegalStateException - if the player is already in the team
      IllegalStateException - if the team is full
      IllegalStateException - if the player does not belong to the team
      IllegalStateException - if no formation is set

    • getPositionCount

      int getPositionCount(IPlayerPosition position)
      Gets the count of players in a specific position.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to count
      Returns:
      The number of players in that position
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if position is null

    • isValidPositionForFormation

      boolean isValidPositionForFormation(IPlayerPosition position)
      Checks if a position is valid for the current formation.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to check
      Returns:
      true if the position is valid for the current formation

    • getTeamStrength

      int getTeamStrength()
      Calculates the strength of the team based on player attributes (e.g. 0-100).
      Returns:
      the average team strength as an integer.

    • setFormation

      void setFormation(IFormation formation)
      Sets the formation for the team.
      Parameters:
      formation - The formation to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if formation is null
